name: Prototype 7
description:
Week 7: Someone Else's Idea

1) It's a sports game.

2) But you control a whole team, not an individual player.
So, has to be a team sport obviously, but which is up to you.

3) A game lasts 2 minutes or less, it can be played more than
once, and there's a definitive win or lose state.

4) Local multiplayer is fine, but single-player is ok too.
